short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your private custom bubble element and share with your team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Component Copy-Paste:
Enable or disable the ability to copy and paste components directly from the Bubble.io visual programming language tool. With this feature turned on, effortlessly duplicate components and streamline your project development process.

2. Project Folder Management:
Take control of your Bubble.io projects by enabling project folder creation and management. Organize your components into neatly structured folders for better project navigation and organization.

3. Automated Project Setup:
Simplify your workflow with automated project setup. When enabled, the extension will assist you in creating a new folder for each copied component, ensuring a clean and efficient project structure.

4. Sync with Bubble.io Workspace:
Connect seamlessly with your Bubble.io workspace. Sync your projects effortlessly, allowing for a smooth transition between the visual programming language tool and the Chrome extension.

5. Customize Extension Behavior:
Tailor the extension to suit your preferences. Customize various settings, such as default folder names, copy-paste behavior, and other options to match your specific workflow requirements.

6. User-Friendly Options:
Our extension settings are designed to be user-friendly, allowing you to configure the extension quickly and easily. No complex setups or technical expertise required.

7. Help and Support:
Access helpful resources and support directly from the settings page. Find documentation, tutorials, and get assistance to make the most out of your Chrome extension for Bubble.io.

8. Stay Updated:
Ensure you are always using the latest features and improvements by keeping the extension up to date. Check for updates and enable automatic updates for a hassle-free experience.
